channel.title: 5 minute intro on JobRunr
channel.description: Recent content in 5 minute intro on JobRunr

item.title: Credits
item.description: Hangfire by Sergey Odinokov JobRunr is a port of Hangfire in .NET to Java and could not have exist without Hangfire being a great example. License: LGPL v3 ASM ASM is used to read the byte code of the provided lambda and find the correct class method and arguments of the job to process in the background. These are then serialized to Json and stored in a StorageProvider. License: BSD
